definition: strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be

sentences.english: Lipoic Acid is a powerful anti-oxidant and helps protect the brain.
sentences.chinese: 硫辛酸是一种强有力的抗氧化剂有助于保护大脑。

sentences.english: Beutiful photos and very powerful representation of a great Nation.
sentences.chinese: 漂亮的图片，这也是对一个大国的强有力的展示。

sentences.english: Indra worried that this powerful sage would one day want to usurp the position of king of heaven.
sentences.chinese: 他担心这位强有力的圣哲有一天会篡夺天帝的位置。

sentences.english: Antibiotic therapy for diffuse cellulitis should be aggressive .
sentences.chinese: 弥漫性蜂窝织炎的抗菌素治疗应是强有力的。

sentences.english: The coffret provides strong added value to personal care products.
sentences.chinese: 与套装提供了强有力的附加价值，个人护理产品。

sentences.english: At sundown, the strong cold wind has shifted from the southeast to the northwest.
sentences.chinese: 日落时分成，强有力的冷风由东南风转为西北风。

sentences.english: The case of Korean scientist Hwang Woo Suk offers one powerful example.
sentences.chinese: 案例之一，南韩科学家，黄禹锡是一个强有力的例子。

sentences.english: There were classical shaped concrete handrails along zig-zag running terrace – strongest element.
sentences.chinese: 沿着之字形平台的经典混凝土扶手是最强有力的元素。

sentences.english: It acts directly on vascular smooth muscle as a potent vasoconstrictor.
sentences.chinese: 它可直接对血管平滑肌作为一种强有力的血管收缩剂。

sentences.english: A powerful launching campaign resulted in the large sales of the new type of air-conditioner.
sentences.chinese: 强有力投放市场活动使该款新空调的销售额大增。

sentences.english: It lies in the blend of clearheaded logic and powerful intuition .
sentences.chinese: 它是清晰的逻辑和强有力的直觉的融合。

sentences.english: At the end of the story, the protagonist emerges as a powerful pugilist.
sentences.chinese: 在故事的结尾，主角变成了一个强有力的拳击家。

sentences.english: The Bush administration was out of gas, and the public was starved for leadership.
sentences.chinese: 布什政府已经黔驴技穷，公众极度渴望强有力的领导。

sentences.english: You will find you can use similes and metaphors to create powerful images.
sentences.chinese: 你将会发现运用明喻和暗喻能创造出强有力的图像。

sentences.english: Use your influence.It is a powerful agent for change.
sentences.chinese: 运用你的影响力，这是变化发生的强有力的原动力。

sentences.english: Gilardi concurs that the newly compiled data is a powerful tool.
sentences.chinese: 吉拉迪认同新汇集的数据是一个强有力的工具。

definition: to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to draw support from/with the help of
to rely on sth (for support etc)/to depend on
